Name: Rapscallion
Ingredients: 45 ml Speyside single malt Scotch whisky
15 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
15 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: POUR pastis into a chilled ice-fillled glass, TOP with chilled water and leave to stand. Separately, STIR other ingredients with ice. DISCARD contents of glass (pastis, water and ice) and STRAIN contents of stirring glass into pastis-coated glass.
Review: Smoky island malts are tamed by the Christmas pudding flavours of pedro ximénez sherry with pastis, adding enlivening anise notes. To quote Ruby's menu, " An unabashedly smoky, Scottish version of the Manhattan. Talisker single malt whisky and stirred over pedro ximenez sweet sherry with a Ricard pastis rinse. A well-loved signature Ruby Cocktail. "
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2007 by Adeline Shepard and Craig Harper at Ruby Bar in Copenhagen, Denmark.
Nutrition: One serving of Rapscallion contains 171 calories
Garnish: Lemon zest twist expressed & discarded. Skewered
